title: Replay systen
body:
Is the replay system live? Is there an official Riot thread on how to use it and download previous games? Been researching into for about two hours now and haven't been able to find anything but third parties. Any information or help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you Summoners. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Replays are still being tested through the updated client.  We do have a [Replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide up, but our client devs are still working towards improving the feature.  

You'll be able to load replays through your match history, but only compatible with the patch it was played during.  If you have any feedback let our devs and testers know through the [client discussions](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  Hope that helps with clearing things up!

Hey, I found the option and viewed it and the record buttom in the replay system when I record, and then stop recording (trying to clip a fiora penta kill) does the file automatically save or is that something else I have to do? Also if where does the file save to what location?

If I understand correctly, I think you're referring to highlight.  This should be available in your My Documents folder under League of Legends.  

C:\Users\\Documents\LeagueofLegends\Highlights

Hope that helps!
